title: Restoration of Data From Corrupt BKF File in Windows 10 - BKF Recovery Software
content:
The release published is for the users to get to know more on the BKF Recovery tool launched a way back by an esteemed organization. Being a Windows based software; it extracts all the backup files which are gone corrupted. 
 
Pune - Maharashtra, India, 
			September 9, 2015	(Newswire) - The release is publicized for the users to know the BKF Recovery tool in deep so as to make it easy to work with. Being Windows supported tool, it attains the recovery of the Windows NTBackup and Symantec VERITAS Backup Exec (. bkf ) files from damage or corruption; no matter how hard the effect of damage is. 
 
The software has gained an image in the market because of the advanced scanning options implemented in the tool. All the three scan modes “Quick”, “Deep” and “Range based” repairs the BKF files from infections and the spectacular feature is the ‘Range based’ scan. If the user is well aware of the range where the data is contained in the BKF file then, the option will help to scan on that particular range instead of a whole scan. If the infection is severe then, user can go with the ‘Deep’ scan mode. 
 
The other features that make the software an eminent one on the online are mentioned below; 
 
-     Enables a successful recovery of the BKF files up to 30 TB​ 
-     Supports on all the versions of Windows 10 and below​ 
-     Extracts the files to original or desired location​ 
-     Allows a quick search for files within the recovered BKF files​ 
-     Affirms selective extraction of the recovered files​ 
​-     Restores all the corrupted files without information loss 
 
Evan Swans, Director of Product Development also speaks that: “The tool has marked as the best software in the field of recovering BKF files. We had a great purchase for the tool and thousands are satisfied with its working. The facilities implemented have added to the marketing of the software. It can recover both the Windows NTBackup & Symantec VERITAS Backup Exec (. bkf ) Files without data loss. The main feature of the product is the scanning implemented in three different levels. Many of the users have shown interest in our product because of the scanning feature.  Moreover, the tool enables the preview of the restored files and allows extracting the files. We constantly verify the need of the users and assure best products for meeting their requirements. Our support team is alert every time for satisfying the users’ queries.” 
 
About the Author: The organization serves the best solutions for the IT users and works on several fields such as data recovery, data conversion, digital forensics, data management, etc. BKF Recovery is one of the products from data recovery field for recovering the damaged or corrupted backup files. 
 
Source:  http://www.corrupt.bkfrepairtool.com
